info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 3:01PM CDT until May 13 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Macoupin County in southwestern Illinois... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 301 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Shipman, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carlinville, Staunton, Gillespie, Mount Olive, Bunker Hill, Benld, Shipman, Wilsonville, Sawyerville, Mount Clare, East Gillespie, Eagarville, Piasa, Medora, White City, Royal Lakes, Chesterfield, Dorchester, Hornsby, and Miles Station. This includes Interstate 55 in Illinois between exits 41 and 44. This also includes Beaver Dam State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
